item.title: Don't Get Kicked!
item.description: Table of Contents 1. Introduction 2. Understand the Problem 3. Get the data 4. Data Exploration 5. Data Preprocessing Data cleaning Handing test and categorical attributes Custom transformer Feature scaling Transformation pipelines 6. Model Training 7. Model Tuning and Evaluations Reference 1. Introduction An auto dealership often purchases a used car at an auto auction. This used car might have serious issues that cannot sell to customers.
